message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $120. I think it's a great deal and I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $110. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $105. It's getting close to my minimum price, but I think it's a fair deal for both of us!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $105. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product.
